original_text: If I have more than enough, I might say that I do not know you. I might say, ‘Who is the Lord?’ But if I am poor, I might rob people. That would insult my God's good name. If I have more than enough, I might say that I do not know you. I might say, ‘Who is the Lord?’
korean_text: 혹 내가 배불러서 하나님을 모른다 여호와가 누구냐 할까 하오며 혹 내가 가난하여 도둑질하고 내 하나님의 이름을 욕되게 할까 두려워함이니이다

sentences.original_text: If I have more than enough
I might say that I do not know you
I might say, 'Who is the Lord?'
That would insult my God's good name
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 내 하나님의 좋은 이름을 모욕할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: If I have more than enough
I might say that I do not know you
I might say, 'Who is the Lord?'
